verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> or Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>, to the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Mahalath <S%H4257><s%> Leannoth <S%H6031><s%>, Maschil <S%H4905><s%> of Heman <S%H1968><s%> the Ezrahite <S%H250><s%>. O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>, I have cried <S%H6817><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> before thee: for the sons: or, of the sons Maschil: or, A Psalm of Heman the Ezrahite, giving instruction
Let my prayer <S%H8605><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto my cry <S%H7440><s%>;
For my soul <S%H5315><s%> is full <S%H7646><s%> of troubles <S%H7451><s%>: and my life <S%H2416><s%> draweth nigh <S%H5060><s%> unto the grave <S%H7585><s%>.
I am counted <S%H2803><s%> with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>: I am as a man <S%H1397><s%> that hath no strength <S%H353><s%>:

Free <S%H2670><s%> among the dead <S%H4191><s%>, like the slain <S%H2491><s%> that lie <S%H7901><s%> in the grave <S%H6913><s%>, whom thou rememberest <S%H2142><s%> no more: and they are cut off <S%H1504><s%> from thy hand <S%H3027><s%>. from: or, by
Thou hast laid <S%H7896><s%> me in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> pit <S%H953><s%>, in darkness <S%H4285><s%>, in the deeps <S%H4688><s%>.
Thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> lieth hard <S%H5564><s%> upon me, and thou hast afflicted <S%H6031><s%> me with all thy waves <S%H4867><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

Thou hast put away <S%H7368><s%> mine acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me; thou hast made <S%H7896><s%> me an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto them: I am shut up <S%H3607><s%>, and I cannot come forth <S%H3318><s%>.

Mine eye <S%H5869><s%> mourneth <S%H1669><s%> by reason of affliction <S%H6040><s%>: LORD <S%H3068><s%>, I have called <S%H7121><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> upon thee, I have stretched out <S%H7849><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> unto thee.
Wilt thou shew <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%> to the dead <S%H4191><s%>? shall the dead <S%H7496><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> and praise <S%H3034><s%> thee? Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Shall thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> be declared <S%H5608><s%> in the grave <S%H6913><s%>? or thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> in destruction <S%H11><s%>?
Shall thy wonders <S%H6382><s%> be known <S%H3045><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%>? and thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of forgetfulness <S%H5388><s%>?
But unto thee have I cried <S%H7768><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> shall my prayer <S%H8605><s%> prevent <S%H6923><s%> thee.
LORD <S%H3068><s%>, why castest thou off <S%H2186><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>? why hidest <S%H5641><s%> thou thy face <S%H6440><s%> from me?
I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and ready to die <S%H1478><s%> from my youth <S%H5290><s%> up: while I suffer <S%H5375><s%> thy terrors <S%H367><s%> I am distracted <S%H6323><s%>.
Thy fierce wrath <S%H2740><s%> goeth over <S%H5674><s%> me; thy terrors <S%H1161><s%> have cut me off <S%H6789><s%>.
They came round about <S%H5437><s%> me daily <S%H3117><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%>; they compassed <S%H5362><s%> me about together <S%H3162><s%>. daily: or, all the day
Lover <S%H157><s%> and friend <S%H7453><s%> hast thou put far <S%H7368><s%> from me, and mine acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> into darkness <S%H4285><s%>.
